casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATL. ASSN.
v.
SURREY MEDWICK ACQUISITION, L.L.C. 2017-1819 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 9, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell, J., dissents and would hold the cause for the decision in 2017-1377, Farmers *500State Bank v. Sponaugle.

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

DeGenaro, J., dissents and would accept the cause on proposition of law No. I and hold the cause for the decision in 2017-1377, Farmers State Bank v. Sponaugle.
